text: @ouipuff @onlyantwans @Truxillogical @amelwhat @deadybones I'm a New Yorker, and I generally understand Boomhaur. Watched King of the Hill from the beginning, so maybe that's why...

@onlyantwans @Truxillogical @amelwhat @deadybones I feel like boomhaur can only be understood by southerners and I feel bad for fuckin anyone outside the country or even northern folk who wanna know what he's sayin
@Truxillogical @amelwhat @deadybones if ur from texas its an easy test
@amelwhat @deadybones The true test is if you can understand Boomhauer
@deadybones fun fact: my college roommate married am Israeli man, and they watched the whole series together so he could practice understanding southern american accents

an animator friend of mine who worked on some extremely significant projects in the anime industry, when asked what his favorite overseas anime was went very quiet and told me, very seriously, “King of the Hill. It is a perfect masterpiece. I can never match this performance.” https://t.co/40Rbz9ihVS
I wonder if there’s one Japanese otaku who’s just really into Doctor Katz and like none of his friends get it.
